title: the afk only brings u the fk
body: dealing with afk player, not from the beginning of the game, they dc after 5 or 10 min, the afk player is banned, but for the rest of players, and the cost brings by the afk player mostly is game lose and lost LP, which mean this is so fking unfair for the team that had a fking afk player and riot just banned them? who about the teammates of that bloody afk player, and do not tell me I suppose to get afk teammate in 4 games out of 10. eat shit

replies.body:
In DOTA 2, if your team has a player AFK, it gives them 5 minutes to reconnect... if they don't then the team is allowed to leave the game with no punishment.


would sort out so many issues

I would love a system like that, however, this can be easily abused. E.g you stomping a team really badly but then they decide to make one guy afk and now everyone on their team gets unpunished and you don't gain lp
no one in there right mind would purposely afk knowing that they'll lose lp for a bunch of randoms.
